converters module

class converters.Converter(objectlist)

Bases: object

converter class to convert a list of dictionary objects to various formats

convert_to_csv(fnames)

converts list of dictionary objects to csv

param fnames

list of field names

convert_to_excel()

converts list of dictionary objects to excel

convert_to_html()

converts list of dictionary objects to html

convert_to_pdf()

converts list of dictionary objects to pdf

convert_to_xml()

converts list of dictionary objects to xml

converters.flatten(obj, keys)

It will flatten the dictionary object specified in the argument :param obj: object to be flattened :param keys: list of keys which are not flattened by default :return: reference of flattened object
